title: Jon Hamm to play villain in 'Baby Driver' movie
text:
The "Mad Men" actor is confirmed to join Ansel Elgort, Lily James and Jamie Foxx in Edgar Wrightâ€˜s "Baby Driver".
Jon Hamm is the latest celebrity to be added to the cast list of Edgar Wright's thriller "Baby Driver". He will be a playing a trader-turned-bank-robber/killer who works with the getaway driver (and lead character) played by Ansel Elgort. Lily James appears as a love interest in the film, and Jamie Foxx will star as the manipulative crime boss.
Hamm joins "Baby Driver" fresh from a long-deserved win at the Emmy Awards. He had been nominated eight times for Best Actor before finally winning for the show's last season.
"Baby Driver"'s release is scheduled for March 17, 2017, and production will start later this year.
